title: Brain Child
description: Alex Lonsdale was one of the most popular kids in La Paloma, California. Until the horrifying car accident. Until a brilliant doctor's medical miracle brought him back from the brink of death.Now, Alex seems the same, but in his eyes there is a blankness. In his heart there is coldness. If his parents, his friends, his girlfriend could see inside his brain, inside his dreams, they would be terrified.One hundred years ago in La Paloma, a terrible deed was done. A cry for vengeance pierced the night. That evil still lives. That vengeance still waits.Waits for Alex Lonsdale.Waits for the...Brainchild.
author: John Saul
